name: House MD
description:
For the Summer Slow Jams Parody Game Jam put on by PIGSquad. 
Theme: Bootleg.

Definitely did not get as far along as we had hoped but that's just how game jams go. But a broken mess sounds like a bad bootleg, right? Have fun with this Dr. House/Mario parody! We intended to have an entire story mode and a lot more fun and intended glitches. However, scope was too large for how much time we ended up having.
